ISSUE.TITLE: Update "admin.configuration.settings.generalcommon.enablecssbundling.hint" and "admin.configuration.settings.generalcommon.enablejsbundling.hint" locales
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.0+ Now we support web farms. So we can remove the following phrase: "Currently it doesn't support web farms."

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5618 Updated some locales after introducing the support web farms
